allow:
Bash(powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "
Add-Type -AssemblyName System.Windows.Forms
$nl = [Environment]::NewLine
$message = ''KeyStats requires .NET 8.0 Desktop Runtime to run.'' + $nl + $nl + ''Open download page?''
[System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox]::Show\(
    $message,
    ''.NET 8.0 Required'',
    [System.Windows.Forms.MessageBoxButtons]::YesNo,
    [System.Windows.Forms.MessageBoxIcon]::Warning
\)
")

Bash(powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -STA -Command "
Add-Type -AssemblyName PresentationFramework
Add-Type -AssemblyName PresentationCore
Add-Type -AssemblyName WindowsBase

$xaml = @''
<Window xmlns=""http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation""
        xmlns:x=""http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml""
        Title="".NET 8.0 Required""
        Width=""420"" Height=""200""
        WindowStartupLocation=""CenterScreen""
        WindowStyle=""None""
        AllowsTransparency=""True""
        Background=""Transparent""
        ResizeMode=""NoResize"">
    <Border Background=""#FAFAFA"" CornerRadius=""8"" BorderBrush=""#E0E0E0"" BorderThickness=""1"">
        <Border.Effect>
            <DropShadowEffect BlurRadius=""20"" ShadowDepth=""2"" Opacity=""0.2""/>
        </Border.Effect>
        <Grid Margin=""24"">
            <Grid.RowDefinitions>
                <RowDefinition Height=""Auto""/>
                <RowDefinition Height=""*""/>
                <RowDefinition Height=""Auto""/>
            </Grid.RowDefinitions>
            <StackPanel Grid.Row=""0"" Orientation=""Horizontal"" Margin=""0,0,0,12"">
                <TextBlock Text="""" FontFamily=""Segoe MDL2 Assets"" FontSize=""24""
                           Foreground=""#D97706"" VerticalAlignment=""Center"" Margin=""0,0,12,0""/>
                <TextBlock Text="".NET 8.0 Required"" FontSize=""16"" FontWeight=""SemiBold""
                           Foreground=""#1F1F1F"" VerticalAlignment=""Center""/>
            </StackPanel>
            <TextBlock Grid.Row=""1"" Text=""KeyStats requires .NET 8.0 Desktop Runtime to run.

Would you like to open the download page?"" FontSize=""14"" Foreground=""#424242""
                       TextWrapping=""Wrap"" LineHeight=""22""/>
            <StackPanel Grid.Row=""2"" Orientation=""Horizontal"" HorizontalAlignment=""Right"" Margin=""0,20,0,0"">
                <Button x:Name=""SecondaryButton"" Content=""Cancel"" Width=""90"" Height=""32""
                        Background=""Transparent"" Foreground=""#1F1F1F"" BorderBrush=""#D0D0D0""
                        BorderThickness=""1"" Margin=""0,0,10,0"" Cursor=""Hand"">
                    <Button.Resources>
                        <Style TargetType=""Border""><Setter Property=""CornerRadius"" Value=""4""/></Style>
                    </Button.Resources>
                </Button>
                <Button x:Name=""PrimaryButton"" Content=""Download"" Width=""90"" Height=""32""
                        Background=""#0067C0"" Foreground=""White"" BorderThickness=""0"" Cursor=""Hand"">
                    <Button.Resources>
                        <Style TargetType=""Border""><Setter Property=""CornerRadius"" Value=""4""/></Style>
                    </Button.Resources>
                </Button>
            </StackPanel>
        </Grid>
    </Border>
</Window>
''@

$reader = [System.Xml.XmlReader]::Create\([System.IO.StringReader]::new\($xaml\)\)
$window = [System.Windows.Markup.XamlReader]::Load\($reader\)

$window.FindName\(''PrimaryButton''\).Add_Click\({ $window.DialogResult = $true; $window.Close\(\) }\)
$window.FindName\(''SecondaryButton''\).Add_Click\({ $window.DialogResult = $false; $window.Close\(\) }\)
$window.Add_MouseLeftButtonDown\({ $window.DragMove\(\) }\)

$window.ShowDialog\(\)
")
